title: The Pandemic‘s Opportunities and Challenges for Racial Justice
itunes:title: The Pandemic‘s Opportunities and Challenges for Racial Justice
description: Prosperity Now CEO Gary Cunningham talks to Rob, in a wide-ranging discussion, about the many ways in which the pandemic has affected racial justice and injustice and how we might overcome the divisions and polarizations that we currently confront.
content:encoded: Prosperity Now CEO Gary Cunningham talks to Rob, in a wide-ranging discussion, about the many ways in which the pandemic has affected racial justice and injustice and how we might overcome the divisions and polarizations that we currently confront.

itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
